subject: Doping (Sports)
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: A New York State report says a spike in horse fatalities at Aqueduct Racetrack in Queens might have been prevented had racing authorities more closely monitored the use of prescription drugs.
snippet: A New York State report says a spike in horse fatalities at Aqueduct Racetrack in Queens might have been prevented had racing authorities more closely monitored the use of prescription drugs.
